metadata.title: CVE-2024-3044 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Unchecked script execution in Graphic on-click binding in affectedLibreOffice versions allows an attacker to create a document which withoutprompt will execute scripts built-into LibreOffice on clicking a graphic.Such scripts were previously deemed trusted but are now deemed untrusted.
